title: No Rashford, Sancho in England squad | Guehi earns first call-up
shortDescription: Marcus Rashford and Jadon Sancho have been left out of the England squad, while Crystal Palace centre-back Marc Guehi has earned his first call-up.

title: Sporting Equals CEO: South Asian women in the game are important
shortDescription: Sporting Equals CEO Arun Kang says it is important to consider South Asian women in the game, adding top-flight representation is nowhere near where it should be.

title: Why May turned down San Diego to level up at Cheltenham
shortDescription: Cheltenham's Alfie May on scoring four against Wycombe and why he turned down a move to the US to commit his future to the Robins.

title: How Marcus Rashford inspired an 11-year-old Utd fan to feed 115,000
shortDescription: An 11-year-old Manchester United fan has raised enough money to pay for over 115,000 meals by walking from Larne in Northern Ireland to Old Trafford.

title: Carra, Nev feel Liverpool will win title | Merse: Don't write off City
shortDescription: Jamie Carragher and Gary Neville believe for the first time that Liverpool will win the Premier League title – but Paul Merson is still backing Manchester City.

title: Midweek hits & misses: Man Utd misery; Liverpool flying
shortDescription: Manchester United endured a miserable midweek as they exited Europe but Liverpool are chasing the Premier League title.

title: Ukraine-Scotland Women's World Cup qualifier moved
shortDescription: Scotland's Women's World Cup qualifier in Ukraine has been postponed until June due to the ongoing invasion of the country by the Russian military.

title: Klopp on Liverpool's title challenge: 'Momentum is fragile'
shortDescription: Jurgen Klopp saw his Liverpool side close in on Premier League leaders Man City after beating Arsenal – but admits any sort of momentum can be lost in an instant.

title: Three minutes that turned the title race
shortDescription: Take a look back at three dramatic minutes in Liverpool's game against Arsenal, which could prove decisive in the outcome of the title race.

title: 'Rangers can handle Belgrade atmosphere' | Red Star 'twice as good' warning
shortDescription: Giovanni van Bronckhorst has no concerns over Rangers handling the Belgrade atmosphere against Red Star.

title: Tuchel on CL ticketing news: 'Thanks for ruining my evening'
shortDescription: Thomas Tuchel says his evening was ruined by reports Chelsea may not be able to sell tickets for any future home Champions League games this season.

title: Kane makes PL history as Spurs keep top-four hopes alive
shortDescription: Harry Kane became the Premier League's highest away goalscorer as Spurs kept their top-four hopes alive with a 2-0 win at Brighton.

title: Liverpool close in on City with Emirates win
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Liverpool's win against Arsenal in the Premier League.

title: Liverpool beat Arsenal to pile pressure on City | Klopp: A very special win
shortDescription: Liverpool beat Arsenal 2-0 at the Emirates Stadium to secure a huge three points in the Premier League title race.

title: WSL: Chelsea close gap to Arsenal | Man City win as Man Utd held
shortDescription: Chelsea closed the gap on Arsenal to two points with a comfortable win over Everton, while Man Utd were held by West Ham after conceding a stoppage-time equaliser.

title: Championship goals, round-up: Huddersfield beaten; Luton, Forest win
shortDescription: Huddersfield's automatic Sky Bet Championship promotion hopes suffered a blow with a 2-0 defeat at Millwall.

title: Villarreal stun Juventus as Italians crash out of CL
shortDescription: Villarreal stunned Juventus with three late goals to win 3-0 in Turin (4-1 on aggregate) and reach the Champions League quarter-final.

title: Afobe double steers Millwall to victory over Huddersfield
shortDescription: Benik Afobe scored both goals as Millwall closed in on the Championship play-off places with an impressive 2-0 victory over promotion-chasing Huddersfield.

title: Swans edge Posh in five-goal thriller
shortDescription: Swansea hot-shot Joel Piroe struck a dramatic added-time winner as City snatched a 3-2 success that dealt a heart-breaking blow to Peterborough's survival hopes.

title: Sheff Utd miss out on return to sixth after draw at Blackpool
shortDescription: Sheffield United's promotion bid continued to stutter as they were second best in an entertaining 0-0 draw at Blackpool.
